roleset.name: To cause a change of state

example.name: agentless passive
example.text: [Dramatic changes]-1 were wrought *-1 upon the political landscape of the U.S. during the 1960s.
example.arg: upon the political landscape of the U.S.

roleset.note: Frames file based on sentences from Webtext 25.2, no VN entry, Frame added by Kev
